original_title: Excellence rewarded: Aion Campus’ Cyber Futures Programme graduates first batch
original_body_lines: A group of industry-ready cybersecurity professionals recently joined the fray after completing the Cyber Futures Programme at Aion Campus, the training arm of the Sierra Group associate Aion Cyber Security (Pvt) Ltd.

The formal certificate awarding ceremony was part of an event at which Aion Campus welcomed and inducted a new batch of students for the Cyber Futures Programme, launched its website, and presented letters of employment to selected students from the past batch.
